amendment.description: To increase by $8,500,000 the amount appropriated for Economic Support Fund assistance, to provide that such funds shall be made available to the United States Institute of Peace for programs in Iraq and Afghanistan, and to provide for an offset.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3714 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3714 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S3680; text: CR S3680) To increase by $8,500,000 the amount appropriated for Economic Support Fund assistance, to provide that such funds shall be made available to the United States Institute of Peace for programs in Iraq and Afghanistan, and to provide for an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3714 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Harkin.
